You might also take a look at how Heritrix is integrated into the 
metacombine project: http://www.metacombine.org/.  Check under the 
software tab.  Here is the original announcement: 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/1905.

Regards 2. in the below, do you want your additions to Heritrix to 
include web UI?  Currently, the Heritrix UI Is not (easily) extensible 
but it wouldn't be difficult making it so you could pass a list of 
webapps, and the context on which to deploy the webapps, to the Heritrix 
embedded Jetty webserver instance.  For example, if you bundled your 
classifier UI up as the classifier.war file, you might browse to 
http://localhost:8080/admin to get the Heritrix admin pages and to 
http://localhost:8080/classifier to obtain your classifier UI.

St.Ack
